title: Zhonya's won't activate
body: Was in a game earlier as Taliyah and had just bought zhonyas and attempted to use it, the icon was greyed out without any cooldown timer. When i pinged the item it said Zhonya's Hourglass : This item has 0 charges. Changed slots and clicked on it and still was unable to use. Not sure if im missing something

replies.body: It's a bug, as far as I'm concerned, there was no changes made towards the zhonyas hourglass.

This sounds like a wierd bug, grab the information you have here and report it on the[ report a bug board ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)if this bug haven't already been talked about. Make sure to[ follow the guidelines](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) when doing so as well and if you can get some screen shots/video proof of what happened along with a link to the match history of said game in question.

If you have any questions about posting on this board or are confused about anything else let me know

~Elam
